idea:
Bayesian Research Private Limited is management consulting firm focusing on all aspects of (python based) statistical experimentations using Bayesian approach for supply chain and demand-side (sales/marketing-related)


Bayesian Research Private Limited has expertise in pymc3/stats models as well other relevant pythonic packages. The company is founded by seasoned professionals from the Insurance & Financial Services industry.


Bayesian Research offers proprietary and award-winning insurance industry-specific products for personal lines of insurance. The company also offers industry-agnostic products and services using analytics and machine learning as a backbone.


High performance OLAP database upto 4000%  (40 X)  faster than SQL Server,  Oracle etc. that can be scaled to petabytes of data and integration with Artificial Intelligence libraries like Tensorflow.
name: BAYESIAN RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
At the sustainer, we offer a complete suite of turnkey sustainable

solutions – for your commercial and residential needs – under one roof

for fast EV charging station integration with grid ensuring optimal and

quality power exchange.

Right from waste-to-energy – the process of recovering valuable

energy from waste to electrical vehicle (EV) solution – to enable mass

adoption of electric vehicles from pilot projects to fully scaled-out

infrastructure – we deliver a range of proven, bankable solutions to

address the global need for better, more environmentally - friendly

alternatives. We believe that armed with our experience and

knowledge in this sector, we can make a big impact on the

environmental, social and economic challenges of our time.

We are fully aware of the challenges that our client’s face and thereon,

deliver tailored solutions to improve operational efficiency and reduce

their environmental footprint. In our quest to tackle climate change,

we can also help you save a lot of money in the long run. Our

sustainable solutions are future-proof, good for your wallet and most

importantly, good for our planet. Ultimately, our mandate is to kick

start a real change by making organizations and/or homes more

energy efficient and being a partner of choice for sustainable energy

solutions. Join us and let’s create a cleaner & greener future together.
name: ENVO-SUSTAINER PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Apro GreenTech is a sustainable environment consultancy. A solution provider which looks for creative, innovative ways incorporate renewable energy & treat environmental issues. We are constantly coming up with creative ways to a greener future and to combat the growing influence of climate change and global warming. We provide complete greening solutions from open access solar to treating waste and harvesting water the smart way. We believe it is our duty to alleviate the growing environmental crisis all over the world, especially in India, and are looking for support in our endeavours.

One of our key achievements was in 2013, when we made roads from waste in a Mumbai suburb using recycled tires and plastic. We were the first in India to make Solar Tree installations across the country, thus promoting the use of renewable energy. Since then, we’ve set up scientific recycling centers and other innovative ways to Reuse, Reduce and Recycle. We frequently launch eco-friendly initiatives and campaigns. A few of our most popular products include Smart Shading, Solar Charging Stations, Natural Water Coolers and Recycling Machines. Our projects have been mentioned in the BusinessLine, DNA, Griha India, Times of India, Hindustan Times, NDTV, Mumbai Mirror, Mid-Day and other media sources.

Our innovations cater to investors in green business, government organisations, urban planning, corporates, CSR activities.
name: APRO GREENTECH

idea:
Paperpink Consultants private Limited is a professional services firm led by Indian Chartered Accountants, in the space of business setup, regulatory registrations & filing, compliance and support, strategy, process designing & improvement, finance, taxation, accounting, planning, back office operations & support, outsourcing, information technology and other related activities.

A super strategy, strong support and best product and brand can put an organization on the competitive map, but only solid execution can keep it there.

We are involved in all aspects of consulting and ensure attention to minute details from inception to completion. Our highly skilled and spirited professionals and subject matter experts strive to develop powerful, business centric customized solutions to maximize efficiency and cost effectiveness for our clients. Under the leadership of senior staff, we provide complete attention to individual engagement needs of the clients to enable them to reach their goals on time and well within the budget.
name: PAPERPINK CONSULTANTS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a group of Technocrats, who are developig a service and a portal to supply non plastic disposabe items / packagings to the local market like baniyas, shopkeepers, restuarants ,chai walas  and many such un organised shops who are using plastic material of packaging and serving food or chai or anything similar.


we are sourcing and hunting for various options available to replace plastic . 


apart from this we are also targetting supplying non plastic disposalbles to Govt Organisations canteens
name: JES SYNDICATE

idea: We are wedsing planner from mumbai.we want to start a wedding banquet chain in mumbai for that we are looking for a funding

idea: Machau intends to cultivate bamboo and manufacture bamboo based products. It also wants to manufacture utility items out of agro waste.

idea: Unicorn Futuring Olympiad (UFO) is program for age group of 13 to 20. It is a 3 month structured online program to equip students with tools and process driven framework that will help them envisage their venture and create viable business plan.
name: TRANSFORMATIVE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Specialist Structured solutions for off-balance sheet supply chain financing to corporates and facilitation of financial inclusion for SME / MSME vendors and dealers at efficient rates through receivable monetisation and capital market access. Our financing solutions are tech enabled to achieve rate optimisation and scalability. www.artfine.in
